Posts.Content: Feb 9, 2008 04:54PM dobiew2 wrote: I had the test done. My mother was diagnosed when she was 36 years old( died 6 months later). I am the only daughter so I figured it was a no brainer as I got cancer too! I was shocked to find out I was negative for the genes~ Now I do know that does not mean it is not genetic as there may be other genes not yet discovered. But I at least have some answers...
Posts.Title: waiting on BRCA test 4kkz katharine

Posts.Content: dobiew2 wrote:  I was here 2 years ago with a DCIS and IDC diagnosis. Had a right mastectomy and a lift on the good breast. Now 2 years later waiting for the test results on that "good" breast.  Thought it would be easier this time around.. but ya know what? it isn't. I am slowly melting. Everytime the phone rings my hands begin to shake and I  time travel to 2 years ago when I heard the news the first time over the phone. My 10 year old is home today from school as they have a snow day. I am worried the call will come, won't be good and I don't want my 10 year old to see me upset. I hate this Leslie  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: been here.. done that and now I am back dobiew2 LiveForToday

Posts.Content: Feb 1, 2008 04:39PM - edited Feb 1, 2008 04:40PM by dobiew2  Thanks so much.. well the call isn't coming today.. More waiting... I lost my Mom to this disease when I was 12( she was 36) it is hard to watch my 10 year old feeling the same feelings I had so long ago He holds on to me extra tight... Told me I didn't need  any breasts.. that I was beautiful without them.. He can touch my heart like no other Thanks you again for all your warmth and compassion. it helps the fear Hugs L  shelia.. you are in my thoughts and prayers for B9 diagnosis. We can hold each other hands :)
Posts.Title: been here.. done that and now I am back dobiew2 LiveForToday

Posts.Content: Feb 1, 2008 11:17AM dobiew2 wrote: I had a biopsy.. Should get the news today or Monday~ Thanks for the hand holding.. I sure could use it Fighting tears back all day L
Posts.Title: been here.. done that and now I am back dobiew2 LiveForToday

Posts.Content: Feb 9, 2008 10:51AM dobiew2 wrote: after 11 days I finally received my results. I had to track them down.. B9! I frankly was shocked.. I have been having some pain in that breast so the doc said wait until the  biopsy area  heals enough and see if I still feel it. I have no rash, inverted nipples, discharge or any other symptom  except for occasional pain.   Relieved yet still worried.  Anyway thanks for all of your support. I appreciate it so much and it helped me immensely. I really wish now I would have had the double mastectomy so I wouldn't have to worry. Hindsight huh? You are all in my prayers.. Leslie
Posts.Title: been here.. done that and now I am back dobiew2 LiveForToday
